## About Me

Four years ago, I made the switch from Business Management to Web Development, a decision that proves to be one of my best moves. Each day brings new coding puzzles to solve, which I thoroughly enjoy.

Beyond work hours, I'm exploring new technologies and expanding my skills. I'm always eager to learn about the latest tools and approaches that can enhance my development work.

</p>
